title: FF! Doc | ZipWriterPipe
paragraphs: A chain of zipWriterPipes can be used to create a ZIP archive. You can use the pipe with different actions (see specified below). Action CLOSE will generate the ZIP archive which is returned as the pipe ouput.
listItems: OPEN To initiate a new collection
WRITE Add an item to an existing collection
LAST Combination of WRITE and CLOSE: Add an item to an existing collection, then finalize the collection
Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

ZipWriterPipe
Pipes
Pipe that creates a ZIP archive (on action close).

A chain of zipWriterPipes can be used to create a ZIP archive. You can use the pipe with different actions (see specified below). Action CLOSE will generate the ZIP archive which is returned as the pipe ouput.

See also
Github - ZipWriterPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.compression.ZipWriterPipe
Syntax
Copy
<ZipWriterPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
zipWriterHandle	text	zipwriterhandle
Session key used to refer to zip session. Must be specified with another value if ZipWriterPipes are nested. Deprecated, use collectionName instead.
